mapper.select: select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_pwd, to_char(q_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss')as q_date, q_confirm, p_no, m_no, q_name from qna where p_no like #{p_no}||'%' order by q_confirm asc, q_no desc

select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_date, Q_CONFIRM, m_no, p_no, q_name, rnum from (select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_date, Q_CONFIRM, m_no, p_no, q_name, rownum as rnum from (select q1.q_no, q_title, q_content, to_char(q_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as q_date, Q_CONFIRM, m_no, p_no, q_name, rownum as rnum from qna q1 inner join (select q_no from qna) q2 on q1.q_no = q2.q_no order by q_no desc) where rownum <= #{end_data} order by q_confirm asc) where rnum >= #{start_data}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(q_no, q_title, q_content, q_pwd, p_no, m_no) values(QNA_seq.nextval, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, #{q_pwd}, (select p_no from product_order where o_no = (select o_no from product_order where m_no = #{m_no} and p_no like #{p_no}||'%')), #{m_no})
mapper.update: update qna set q_confirm = 0 where m_no = #{m_no}
update qna set q_name = (select substr((select m_id from member where m_no = #{m_no}), 1,length((select m_id from member where m_no = #{m_no))-3) from dual)
mapper.select: select nvl((select 1 from qna where q_no=#{q_no} and q_pwd=#{q_pwd}), 0)as state from dual

select * from( select rownum as rnum, q_no, q_title, q_content, q_name, q_date, pi_route, pi_file from( select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_name, q_date, pi_route, pi_file from (select ppno, pno, pi_route, pi_file from (select min(pno) ppno, p_no pno from (select pno, substr(p_no, 1, instr(p_no, 'S') - 1) p_no from (select DISTINCT min(pi_no) pno, p_no from product_img group by(p_no))) group by (p_no)) inner join product_img on pi_no = ppno) end1 inner join (select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_name, to_char(q_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') q_date, substr(p_no, 1, 7) p_no from qna where m_no = #{m_no} order by q_no desc) end2 on pno = p_no order by q_no desc ) where rownum <= #{end_data}) where rnum >= #{start_data}

select nvl(count(*), 0) from (select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_name, q_date, pi_route, pi_file from (select ppno, pno, pi_route, pi_file from (select min(pno) ppno, p_no pno from (select pno, substr(p_no, 1, instr(p_no, 'S') - 1) p_no from (select DISTINCT min(pi_no) pno, p_no from product_img group by(p_no))) group by (p_no)) inner join product_img on pi_no = ppno) end1 inner join (select q_no, q_title, q_content, q_name, to_char(q_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') q_date, substr(p_no, 1, 7) p_no from qna where m_no = #{m_no} order by q_no desc) end2 on pno = p_no order by q_no desc )
